website_summaries.verdict: Durable ratchet straps that can handle any job, large or small, without damaging your items.
pros: Made of thick webbing that won't scratch or damage your belongings
Long straps can hold down large items easily
cons: It takes a little more effort to adjust these straps

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy that I purchased these straps rather than the other options at lower price points. These are a quality product and the attention to detail shows. I haul a lot of things on my trailer to support my construction habit and these straps get a real workout. The cinch straps and the storage bag are very nice extra features. If you are looking for a quality product buy these with confidence. I wish they offered some in a 1-inch version.
customer_reviews.author: P. Prince

customer_reviews.title: Best ratchet straps I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have purchased and used countless ratchet straps and can straps over the years — mostly from big box retailers or discount tool retailers. These are so much better. They seem more durable, and they are much better at *releasing* then any others when attempting to unload cargo. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: First of all I like the name but more importantly I really like the ...
customer_reviews.text: First of all I like the name but more importantly I really like the straps. Well made with lots of stitching and the hooks will not release when you are strapping an item down to a trailer. I use these straps for all kinds of different things and for everyone of them they have worked great. I have had plenty of other straps in the past but the Badass straps are just what they say they are, Badass.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great for my crew side by side
customer_reviews.text: Use these at 4 points to tie down my crew side by side to the trailer when towing. They are super thick and strong. The sxs weighs about 1500 lbs and once these are attached it's not going anywhere. Like the rubber grips on the ratchets, easier on the hands when cranking them down to compress the sxs suspension.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID D.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Strong and reliable. I feel that my motorcycle is securely tied doe on my travel trailer when traveling with it. To me it took a little getting use to but really like them now that I’m used to using them. Probably overkill but better safe then sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Bob T.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Quality straps.!!!! Very well built and extremely durable, but this comes at a price. However these will outlast all those cheaper straps on the market. Plus you don't have to worry about them failing on you.
customer_reviews.author: LEINEBOY69

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: very durable straps, like that the S hook curves 180 degrees. no worry of coming undone. so far i haven't experienced one coming loose while trailering quads, which is re-assuring. no rust, been in rain multiple times. the velcro straps that come with them are a nice touch, but the plastic loop is their weak point. not a big deal. highly recommend, i own 12!
customer_reviews.author: Cashin P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Ratched Straps - But The Name?
customer_reviews.text: Straps are awesome! They are well made and work smoothly and can hold a very heavy load. They are overkill for everyday tie-down of cargo but they are invaluable when you are cinching machinery, bikes, sleds or other items you can't afford to damage or lose. But I do blush when I take the bag out.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Straps for Motorcycle Transporting!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to transport my Ducati XDiavel S using a Uhaul motorcycle trailer. These straps are super long, but worked out well. No issues. I would recommend them...although I've only used them once. Whats cool is they come in their own storage/carry bag. I'd buy it again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely the best tie-downs I own. After dealing with several sets of cam lock and a lesser set of ratcheting tie downs, I found these. Checked the specs, read some reviews and bought them. They are bigger, longer, and stronger than the smaller ones, and well worth the extra dollars! Delivery was on time and product packaging was great. I can finally secure canoes, camping gear, tools and toys with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Dibble

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find good, quality ratchet straps like this any more. Remember the heavy duty ones you used to be able to buy? These are it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Badass moto gear tie downs
customer_reviews.text: Way better than my old 1" tie downs that are not ratcheted. Gteat price
customer_reviews.author: 2011 roadglide

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used for securing 5 gal Jerry cans to the roof rack of my Jeep. Straps are of good quality and ratchet handles are big and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Mccaden Hjelm

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get the mechanism to unlock- just crappy manufacturing. Really wanted to like them but appears ...
customer_reviews.text: Couple already unusable after about a dozen times. Cannot get the mechanism to unlock- just crappy manufacturing. Really wanted to like them but appears all hype. Doubt the 5 star reviews actually strap stuff down more than one in a while.
customer_reviews.author: jAndrew

customer_reviews.title: Great Tie Downs
customer_reviews.text: Tie Downs have coated S hooks, a carry bag, and Velcro straps to keep the tie downs and ratchets organized. I returned the doubl J hook tie downs due to lack of coating. I wanted to protect my Putco Truckbed bars from scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Clouseau

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for Yakima racks with wide gap hooks!
customer_reviews.text: Best tie downs and ratchets for the money...especially the fact that they have wide gap hooks which I needed for my car top boat rack. Most hooks are too narrow and these are just what I needed for my Yakima racks.
customer_reviews.author: Tfia

customer_reviews.title: Great Straps
customer_reviews.text: These ratchet straps are great... The straps are tough and solid, the hooks are reinforced, and the ratchet is very tough. WLL is 1100lbs which is alot more than most Motorcycle straps. I've used them quite a few times since my purchase and I didn't have to worry about them they have done a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Badass Moto Gear
customer_reviews.text: I can’t really say what I like about this. I bought it as a Christmas present for my husband so have to wait until then to say how good they are.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Badass exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for the bike, the trike, the side by side and the zero turn mowers. No problems, no issues, no fails, no fraying.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. BBG

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used these yet, but they feel very well built and will update once we load up the bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, heavy duty straps!
customer_reviews.text: Legit! These are heavy duty straps! They are exactly what I would expect to get when I am looking for heavy duty straps (but hardly ever do these days). Great, well made tough straps!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Booth

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Strong Straps
customer_reviews.text: I am using them to attach a trolley system to a 7' pool table, to move it intact (with the legs removed) I'll let you know next week how well it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Neon Doc

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I wanted in a tie down strap. Holds my UTV and ATV in place firmly and I don't have to worry about a weak strap breaking. Ratchets are smooth and do not bind up like many others that I had before. If I ever need more tie downs I will Purchas more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tie downs, well made, well packaged, and reasonably priced. I've tried many and I like these best.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wanderman

customer_reviews.title: ... never write a review about a product but felt like i needed to on this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Usually never write a review about a product but felt like i needed to on this purchase. These ratchet straps are by far the best straps you can buy. I completed a 900 mile trip with a 1500lb smoker and could not have been happier. These are really heavy duty the straps never lost tension and the full 180' s hooks on both ends really make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars out of Five
customer_reviews.text: These straps are heavy duty and work smoothly. Badass Moto Gear delivered them in perfect condition ahead of schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep as primary strap kit!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to my tie down kit. Bought two sets and used them both to secure a 10k generator and other items on trailer for over 800 mile trip.
customer_reviews.author: Manny Q

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Ratchets work great. 4 stars because there were a lot of loose threads and odd looking stitches on one of the straps which makes me question the quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent straps, at least twice as thick as others in the same width. I will buying another set.
customer_reviews.author: highwaydevil

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lost my last set and picked these up as a replacement. Very pleased, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Derek B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the carry case and the straps! Already used them twice, and they worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome straps, strong with large ratchets, not your normal thin weak straps from big box stores!!!
customer_reviews.author: JJ Prime

customer_reviews.title: Ratchet tie downs.
customer_reviews.text: Great tie downs. Really like the large size of the ratchet lever. Easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Mears

customer_reviews.title: worked good heavy duty stronger than most.
customer_reviews.text: worked well for moving heavy items at work, the bag is nice to store them in until needed again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Quality is always important when your strapping something down.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend buying these. They came in a really nice tote bag, Keeping everything together is always a pain trying to find that Just Right Something to hold everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jammie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great!!! Bought these and on my first use I trailer-ed 4 wheelers 400 miles and back. No issues ratchets didnt slip and no frays. Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: 5point5six

customer_reviews.title: good straps.
customer_reviews.text: these are good, not great, but good and they work well. They are strong enough for my needs and they operate smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bloomfield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality tie down straps. Surprised by the carry bag that was included. Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Used only once so far, nice quality and value, happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: High quality product, and great customer service. I could not be much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product- easy to use, strong and long enough to properly secure a load on a 7 foot wide trailer. I put them to use as soon as I received them. Order was also shipped promptly and properly packaged for safe shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good straps, soft feel, heavy duty ratchet mechanism not a bad word to say.
customer_reviews.author: Joel O.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice straps to use on my SxS
customer_reviews.text: Really nice straps to use on my SxS. The 1 1/2" width on these straps are just right. The racket works great and the strap material is thicker then other straps. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality at a great price. Handy storage pouch also.
customer_reviews.author: jtinn

customer_reviews.title: these do look like very well made straps
customer_reviews.text: Rite out of the box, these do look like very well made straps, have not used them as of yet. like the heavy 1.5 inch, 15 foot strap material. heavy ratcheting mechanism..
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bad to the bone, exceeded my expectations. easy to use, and durable high quality.
customer_reviews.author: brian p amato

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, well made, heavy duty straps!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the quality of these straps. They are well worth price and a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Best straps ever
customer_reviews.text: Best straps money can buy! Bought 1 pack and was so impressed bought 2 more packs the next day
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: This is going to be a Christmas gift so a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be a Christmas gift so a full review can come later. Visually appears to be okay. (Clear packaging)
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Only 10ft long not 15ft as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The description for the strap says 15ft but the 4 I received are only 10ft hook to hook max.
customer_reviews.author: David L

product_meta.title: Badass Moto Gear 15' 3300 Lb Heavy Duty Ratchet Straps 4 Pk. 1100 Lb Load - 180º S Hooks Padded Ratchet Strap Set - 4 Tie Down Straps - Motorcycle, Cargo, Trailer, Truck - EZ Grip Smart Handle
product_meta.description:
Do you want Premium ratchet straps you can count on to never let you down?



 Each component of our Badass Moto Gear Ratchet Straps has at least an impressive 3300 Lb or higher breaking strength & 1100 Lb or higher work load rating in order to give you 100% reliability and confidence on the road. 

You'll notice the superior quality and workmanship right away.

 Powerful ergonomic padded ratchet handles have wide hand grips and are comfortable & easy to use. Padding is integrated into the handle & will never break or fall off. 



 High tech UV weather resistant webbing is amazingly soft & won't scratch your finishes. All seams are reinforced for extra strength and security up to 900% more than other “premium” brand tie down straps using our proven Triple-Diamond stitching system. Other top brand straps use only 1” of overlapping webbing material and about 6” of thread to secure the seams that connect the Hooks to the straps, our advanced smart-strap design uses over 54 inches of thread and a whopping 6 inches of overlapping triple layer webbing.

 Full "S" Hooks Stay secure. Our hooks are the strongest safety coated S hooks in class & have a full 180 degree turn so they stay attached to your anchor.

 Protect your loads. Trailer & tow with confidence and style using these Super Heavy Duty Ratchet straps by Badass Moto Gear. These premium quality tiedowns are 100% LIFETIME SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – Like all Badass Moto Gear products, you can use these tie-downs with complete confidence. If one breaks or frays, we'll replace it, even if you abused it.

BEST FOR: Motorcycle, Trike, Snowmobile, Scooter, Lawn mower, Surfboard, Paddleboard, Trailer, Garden Tractor, Truck Bed, Tailgate, Pallet or Container, Furniture, Appliance, Jeep & Off Road, ATV, Horse & Livestock, Farm, Home & Garden, Golf Carts, Lumber, Building material, Hunting, Hitching & Towing.
feature_bullets: EXTRA STRONG & WELL MADE - Built to Commercial Standard w/ Best-in-class 3300 Lb breaking strength.
EASY TO USE - Padded Ratchet Handle Grip Is Ergonomic & Includes Convenient Easy-Release Lever.
WON'T SCRATCH PAINT OR CHROME – Ultra Soft, High Tech Webbing uses UV & Mildew Resistant Material.
PROTECTS YOUR GEAR – Padded Hooks & Rounded Safety Edges. 180 Degree “S” Bend Means Hooks Stay Put.
HIGH QUALITY & SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – You Can Haul Your Large & Heavy Cargo with Confidence.

specifications.Special Features: Includes Free Bonus Duffel for Easy Storage, Reinforced Triple Diamond Stitching for Extreme Durability, Includes 4 Premium Velcro Keepers to Secure Leftover Strap Length, High Quality Ergonomic Rubber Grip Handle will never come off
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars100 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
